author: Kim Lyons
title: Instacart is hiring even more shoppers and adding ‘wellness checks’ to its shopper app
description: Grocery delivery platform Instacart says it plans to add 250,000 new shoppers, is extending the sick pay period for shoppers with COVID-19, and is introducing new safety measures for workers, including an in-app “wellness check.”
